title: California State University: terms of employment.
subject: CaliforniaStateUniversity
termsofemployment

abstracts.abstract:
Existing law establishes the California State University and provides for its administration by the Trustees of the California State University. Existing law requires the trustees to provide by rule for the government of their appointees and employees.

This bill would make nonsubstantive changes to that requirement.

actions.description: Introduced. Read first time. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.

extras.impact_clause: An act to amend Section 89500 of the Education Code, relating to public postsecondary education.
